languages.text: {n}Заметив Соломона, она заметно мрачнеет.{/n} "Первый раз вижу, чтобы к нам арбитр захаживал. Вы сюда явно не выпить пришли, так что скажу сразу: у нас нарушителей Лекса нет, тут пьют люди простые и скромные".

{n}Her face drops when she notices Solomorne.{/n} "First time I've seen an Arbitrator walk into our establishment. I doubt you're here to wet your whistle, so I'll lay it out for you: we don't have any Lex violators in here, just simple, modest folks who need a drink."
languages.original_text: {n}Заметив Соломона, она заметно мрачнеет.{/n} "Первый раз вижу, чтобы к нам арбитр захаживал. Вы сюда явно не выпить пришли, так что скажу сразу: у нас нарушителей Лекса нет, тут пьют люди простые и скромные".

{n}Her face falls when she notices Solomorne.{/n} "First time I've seen an Arbitrator walk into our establishment. I doubt you're here to wet your whistle, so I'll lay it out for you: we don't have any Lex violators in here, just simple, modest folks who need a drink."

{n}Her face drops when she notices Solomorne.{/n} "First time I've seen an Arbitrator walk into our establishment. I doubt you're here to wet your whistle, so I'll lay it out for you: we don't have any Lex violators in here, just simple, modest folks who need a drink."

{n}Her face drops when she notices Solomorne.{/n} "First time I've seen an Arbitrator walk into our establishment. I doubt you're here to wet your whistle, so I'll lay it out for you: we don't have any Lex violators in here, just simple, modest folks who need a drink."

{n}Her face drops when she notices Solomorne.{/n} "First time I've seen an Arbitrator walk into our establishment. I doubt you're here to wet your whistle, so I'll lay it out for you: we don't have any Lex violators in here, just simple, modest folks who need a drink."

{n}Her face drops when she notices Solomorne.{/n} "First time I've seen an Arbitrator walk into our establishment. I doubt you're here to wet your whistle, so I'll lay it out for you: we don't have any Lex violators in here, just simple, modest folks who need a drink."

languages.text: {n}当她看到索罗蒙的时候，立刻拉下了脸。{/n}“这还是第一次有法务官来这里。我怀疑你不是来喝酒的，所以我得先把话说清楚。这里没有任何人违反帝国律法，大家只是勤勤恳恳的普通人，来喝一杯而已。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her face drops when she notices Solomorne.{/n} "First time I've seen an Arbitrator walk into our establishment. I doubt you're here to wet your whistle, so I'll lay it out for you: we don't have any Lex violators in here, just simple, modest folks who need a drink."

traits.locale_text: {n}当她看到索罗蒙的时候，立刻拉下了脸。{/n}“这还是第一次有法务官来这里。我怀疑你不是来喝酒的，所以我得先把话说清楚。这里没有任何人违反帝国律法，大家只是勤勤恳恳的普通人，来喝一杯而已。”

languages.text: {n}Su expresión se tuerce al fijarse en Solomorne.{/n} «Es la primera vez que veo a un Arbitrator entrar en nuestro establecimiento. Dudo que venga a echar un trago, de modo que lo explicaré bien claro: aquí nadie ha quebrantado la Lex. Solo hay gente sencilla y modesta que necesita una bebida».
languages.original_text: {n}Her face drops when she notices Solomorne.{/n} "First time I've seen an Arbitrator walk into our establishment. I doubt you're here to wet your whistle, so I'll lay it out for you: we don't have any Lex violators in here, just simple, modest folks who need a drink."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su expresión se tuerce al fijarse en Solomorne.{/n} «Es la primera vez que veo a un Arbitrator entrar en nuestro establecimiento. Dudo que venga a echar un trago, de modo que lo explicaré bien claro: aquí nadie ha quebrantado la Lex. Solo hay gente sencilla y modesta que necesita una bebida».

languages.text: {n}Son visage se fige quand elle remarque Solomorne.{/n} « C'est la première fois qu'un arbitrator entre dans notre établissement. Je doute que vous soyez là pour vous rincer le gosier, alors j'irai droit au but : je ne protège aucun criminel, je ne sers que des honnêtes gens qui souhaitent se détendre autour d'un verre. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her face drops when she notices Solomorne.{/n} "First time I've seen an Arbitrator walk into our establishment. I doubt you're here to wet your whistle, so I'll lay it out for you: we don't have any Lex violators in here, just simple, modest folks who need a drink."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son visage se fige quand elle remarque Solomorne.{/n} « C'est la première fois qu'un arbitrator entre dans notre établissement. Je doute que vous soyez là pour vous rincer le gosier, alors j'irai droit au but : je ne protège aucun criminel, je ne sers que des honnêtes gens qui souhaitent se détendre autour d'un verre. »

languages.text: {n}彼女はソロモーンに気づいた瞬間、顔を曇らせた。{/n}「うちの店にアービトレイターが入ってくるのを見るのは初めてだわ。喉を潤しに来たとは思えないから、はっきり言わせてもらうけど…ここにはレックスの〈造反者〉なんていないわ。ただの、ささやかな一杯を必要としてる普通の人たちよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Her face drops when she notices Solomorne.{/n} "First time I've seen an Arbitrator walk into our establishment. I doubt you're here to wet your whistle, so I'll lay it out for you: we don't have any Lex violators in here, just simple, modest folks who need a drink."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女はソロモーンに気づいた瞬間、顔を曇らせた。{/n}「うちの店にアービトレイターが入ってくるのを見るのは初めてだわ。喉を潤しに来たとは思えないから、はっきり言わせてもらうけど…ここにはレックスの〈造反者〉なんていないわ。ただの、ささやかな一杯を必要としてる普通の人たちよ」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'u fark edince yüzü düşüyor.{/n} "İlk kez işletmemize adım atan bir Yargıcı görüyorum. Buraya sarhoş olmaya gelmemişsindir diye düşünüyorum. Baştan söyleyeyim, burada Lex ihlalcileri olmaz. Buraya sadece normal, kendi hâlinde demlenen halk gelir."
languages.original_text: {n}Her face drops when she notices Solomorne.{/n} "First time I've seen an Arbitrator walk into our establishment. I doubt you're here to wet your whistle, so I'll lay it out for you: we don't have any Lex violators in here, just simple, modest folks who need a drink."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'u fark edince yüzü düşüyor.{/n} "İlk kez işletmemize adım atan bir Yargıcı görüyorum. Buraya sarhoş olmaya gelmemişsindir diye düşünüyorum, baştan söyleyeyim: Burada Lex ihlalcileri olmaz. Buraya sadece normal, kendi hâlinde demlenen halk gelir."

languages.text: {n}Ihre Miene wird ernst, als sie Solomorne bemerkt.{/n} "Das ist das erste Mal, dass ein Arbitrator unseren Laden betritt. Ich bezweifle, dass Ihr etwas trinken wollt, also sage ich Euch geradeheraus, dass wir keine Lex-Brecher hier haben, sondern nur einfache, bescheidene Leute, die einen Drink brauchen."
languages.original_text: {n}Her face drops when she notices Solomorne.{/n} "First time I've seen an Arbitrator walk into our establishment. I doubt you're here to wet your whistle, so I'll lay it out for you: we don't have any Lex violators in here, just simple, modest folks who need a drink."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre Miene wird ernst, als sie Solomorne bemerkt.{/n} "Das ist das erste Mal, dass ein Arbitrator unseren Laden betritt. Ich bezweifle, dass Ihr etwas trinken wollt, also sage ich Euch geradeheraus, dass wir keine Lex-Brecher hier haben, sondern nur einfache, bescheidene Leute, die einen Drink brauchen."
